modName: The Boned Dagger By Sir Vincent
summary: The Dagger Of The Ancient Dragon
descriptionHtml:
A Mod That Will Add A Dagger Made Of Dragon Bones To The Game.
In The Misc Section.

Copy Right

This Is A Mod Created By Me And Me Alone No One Else.
Any Other User Claiming Ownership Is Jealous I Guess. 
If Some-one Would Appear Claiming Ownership Just Take A Look At The File Date It Could Have Ended Up Every Where On The Internet By Now 

As Far As I Know i Have Deleted Every copy Of My Files On The Web This Would Be The Only One Of Its Kind On This Website

*Information Regarding The Dagger*


An Ancient Dagger Found In The Remains On Old Skeleton Inside Of A Dragon Carcass Located In A Hidden Cave In The Dark Forrest Surrounded By Baby Dragons ( I Know It Might Not Sound That Dangerous \'Baby Dragons\" Believe Me They Are Just As Vicious As Those Full Grown Flying Lizards )

The Trip Inside The Cave Wasn\'t As Difficult As I Would Have Thought it Was Just A Breeze Venturing Trough The Cave .
As The Time Flew By I Started Wondering.

How Long Could This Cave Be ?
When Would I Reach The End ?
Will I Even Reach The End ? 
Why Am I Here?
How Did I End Up Here?

When I Was Almost At An End Of My Questions A Bright Light Appeared In Front Of Me Shaped In The Form Of A Giant Lizard.
it Spoke To Me In An Language Long Forgotten By The Mortal\'s.
I Couldn\'t Decipher What Was Said To Me .
Then All Of A Sudden The Light Dashed Away From Me I Ran After It With My Last Remaining Bit Of Energy .

The Spirit Brought Me To What Seemed To Be An Ancient Altar .
I Looked At The Spirit It Looked At Me With A Childish Gaze Of His Face He Lifted His Arm Pointing To The Altar I Took A Closer Look On The Altar The Smouldering Remains Of A Dragon Carcass Appeared Out Of No-Where. 

I Started To Approach The Altar My Eye\'s Fell On A  Skeleton Locked In Side Of The Rib Cage Of The Dragon\'s Smouldering Carcass When I Was Finally Close Enough At The Skeleton I Started To Examine It I Found 2 Item\'s One Of Them Being A Strange Looking Dagger The Other Item Appeared To Be A Book Containing  The Tale Of The Dagger.

When I Started To Read The Book My Mind Was Filled With The Stories Involving  The Dagger I Learned The Real Name Of The Dagger It Was Called The \"Bone Slayer\"


Wanna Comment On The Mod?
But There Is No Comment Bar?

Too Bad For You Then.

*Small Note*

I Wont Be Reading Private Message\'s

Regards 

Sir Vincent
The Modding Royalist
author: Sir Vincent
